treatments.name: Angioplasty
treatments.details: Surgical repair or unblocking of a blood vessel, especially a coronary artery.
treatments.rules: CGHS - Coronary Angioplasty with stent (inclusive of stent cost as per ceiling).

treatments.name: Cataract Surgery
treatments.details: Removal of the lens of the eye and replacement with an artificial lens.
treatments.rules: CGHS - IOL Implantation (Folder IOL) per eye.

treatments.name: Hernia Repair
treatments.details: Surgical operation for the correction of a hernia.

treatments.name: Knee Replacement
treatments.details: Surgical procedure to replace the weight-bearing surfaces of the knee joint.
treatments.rules: CGHS - Total Knee Replacement (Unilateral) including implant.
